name: EM400-MUD
description: EM400-MUD is a versatile device among EM400 series, that are equipped with multiple application modes catering to a variety of scenarios such as smart waste management, smart parking and other distance / level measurement applications. EM400-MUD constitutes a powerful solution with its various modes, extended battery life, and robust build, providing a cost-effective and reliable option to enhance efficiency.
author: Akenza AG
